results.title: The management of rosacea.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@Flushing@@@ is better prevented rather than treated, and its etiology investigated. Beta-blockers, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in particular, are worthy of prophylactic trials examining their efficacy in treating the @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@ associated with @<m>DISEASE_Rosacea</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012393 @@@rosacea@@@.
